Pre-Game Insights: Ireland head coach Heinrich Malan said the pitch is a bit tricky and it's playing on the up
Navneet Dhaliwal said the pitch is a bit difficult and you have to play conventional cricket
Post-Match Reflections: Canada captain Saad Bin Zafar has an economy rate of 6.14 against right-hand batters in T20 cricket
Miscellaneous Highlights: The fast bowlers have so far held sway here, having picked up 18 of the 26 wickets to fall while going at an economy rate of 5.46
Canada and Ireland have a 2-2 head-to-head record in T20Is
Others: The pitch is uneven and has prodigious movement up front
The slow, sand-based outfield has not helped the batters in any way
